Metadata.title: GamutCut - Gamut Mask Creation Tool
Metadata.description: GamutCut is a tool site where you can create 'Gamut Masks' used in the 'Gamut Mapping' coloring method to create a sense of unity, without logging in. It uses the HSV color wheel model suitable for digital illustrations, so it can be used with a wide range of graphic paint software.
Metadata.og_description: A tool to create gamut masks that bring unity to digital illustration coloring. Use it now without logging in!
Metadata.twitter_description: A tool to create gamut masks that bring unity to digital illustration coloring.

Introduction.overview: This is an illustration production tool that supports unified coloring by creating a gamut mask by arranging shapes on a color wheel.
Introduction.feature_hsv_desc: Adopts the HSV color wheel model suitable for digital illustration coloring!
Introduction.feature_speedy_desc: Create gamut masks without logging in!
Introduction.feature_export_desc: Export created masks as PNG instantly!
Introduction.feature_no_download_desc: Everything runs in the browser, so no software installation or setup is needed!
Introduction.feature_intuitive_desc: Designed for intuitive, easy-to-understand, and comfortable operation!
Introduction.feature_share_desc: Create illustrations using your masks and post them! You might find coloring tips from other users' works...!
Introduction.flow_1_desc: Decide the main color you want to use in your illustration.
Introduction.flow_2_desc: Create a shape as a mask with the main color as a vertex.
Introduction.flow_3_desc: Download the masked color wheel in PNG format.
Introduction.flow_4_desc: Extract colors using the eyedropper tool in your graphics software and color.
Introduction.cta_title: Why not create a gamut mask right now?
Introduction.cta_desc: You can try it immediately without registration.
Introduction.faq_1_a: A gamut mask is a mask of an arbitrary shape placed on a color wheel, used in the 'gamut mapping' technique to color using only the colors within that mask. This allows for coloring while maintaining a unified color scheme.
Introduction.faq_2_q: Can I use it without logging in?
Introduction.faq_2_a: Yes. You can create and export gamut masks without logging in. If you register as a user, you can use additional features such as saving masks and posting works.
Introduction.faq_3_q: What graphic software can I use?
Introduction.faq_3_a: You can use any graphic software that has an eyedropper tool, such as Clip Studio Paint or Photoshop. Please extract colors from the exported color wheel image using the eyedropper tool.
Introduction.faq_4_q: Can I use it for things other than digital illustration?
Introduction.faq_4_a: This tool is mainly designed for digital illustration production. Please note that it may not be suitable for UI design of websites, etc.
Introduction.faq_5_q: Can I save the created mask?
Introduction.faq_5_a: If you register as a user, you can save the created mask as a preset. Saved masks can be reused from the 'My Mask List'.

CreateMask.alert_max_masks: You can add up to 3 masks.
CreateMask.login_required: Login is required to use My Masks
CreateMask.temp_message: * Please note that some pages may not be displayed correctly or may be displayed in the original language as translation is in progress.

Tour.step1_content: Here you can create gamut masks.
Tour.step2_content_1: Place masks on the color wheel. (Up to 3)
Tour.step2_content_2: You can adjust the size and shape.
Tour.step3_content_1: You can download the created mask as a PNG image.
Tour.step3_content_2: Use the eyedropper tool in your paint software to extract colors for coloring.
Tour.step4_content_1: You can save the created mask with a name.
Tour.step5_content_1: Saved masks will be displayed here.

Login.is_this_first?: Is this your first time using GamutCut?

Tags.title: Tags
Tags.placeholder: Please enter a tag and press the Enter key or the Add button.
Tags.help: You can add tags by pressing the Enter key or the Add button. You can remove tags by clicking them.

WorkDetail.delete_confirmation_message: Once deleted, it cannot be recovered.
WorkDetail.delete_confirmation_question: Are you sure you want to delete?
WorkDetail.mask_copied: Mask copied. Redirecting to mask creation page.

TermsOfService.title: Terms of Service
TermsOfService.intro: These Terms of Service (hereinafter referred to as "these Terms") set forth the terms and conditions for using the service (hereinafter referred to as "the Service") provided by {serviceName} (hereinafter referred to as "the Company") on this website. All registered users (hereinafter referred to as "Users") shall use the Service in accordance with these Terms.

article_1.title: Article 1 - Application
article_1.content_1: ・These Terms shall apply to all relationships regarding the use of the Service between Users and the Company.
article_1.content_2: ・In addition to these Terms, the Company may establish various rules regarding the use of the Service (hereinafter referred to as "Individual Provisions"). These Individual Provisions shall constitute a part of these Terms, regardless of their names.
article_1.content_3: ・In the event that the provisions of these Terms conflict with the provisions of the Individual Provisions in the preceding paragraph, the provisions of the Individual Provisions shall take precedence unless otherwise specified in the Individual Provisions.

article_2.title: Article 2 - Changes to Terms of Service
article_2.content_1: ・The Company may change these Terms at any time at its discretion. When making changes, the Company will appropriately notify Users of the changes, their content, and the effective date in a manner determined by the Company.
article_2.content_2: ・The revised Terms shall become effective from the time they are posted on the Service, unless otherwise specified by the Company.
article_2.content_3: ・If a User uses the Service after the revised Terms become effective, the User shall be deemed to have agreed to all of the revised Terms.

article_3.title: Article 3 - Handling of Personal Information
article_3.content_1: ・The Company shall properly handle personal information obtained through the use of the Service in accordance with the Company's "Privacy Policy".

article_4.title: Article 4 - User Registration
article_4.content_intro: The Company will not use information obtained from customers for purposes other than the following:
article_4.content_1: 1. In the Service, user registration shall be completed when a registration applicant agrees to these Terms, applies for user registration by the method specified by the Company, and the Company approves the application.
article_4.content_2: 2. The Company may not approve an application for user registration if it determines that the applicant has any of the following reasons, and shall not be obligated to disclose any reasons:
article_4.content_2_1: ・If false information was provided in the application for user registration
article_4.content_2_2: ・If the application is from someone who has violated these Terms
article_4.content_2_3: ・In any other case where the Company deems user registration inappropriate

article_5.title: Article 5 - Management of User ID and Password
article_5.content_1: ・Users shall appropriately manage their User IDs and passwords for the Service at their own responsibility.
article_5.content_2: ・Users may not, under any circumstances, transfer or lend their User IDs and passwords to third parties, or share them with third parties. The Company shall deem any login with a combination of User ID and password that matches the registered information as use by the User who registered that User ID.
article_5.content_3: ・The Company shall not be liable for any damages caused by the use of User IDs and passwords by third parties, except in cases of intentional or gross negligence by the Company.

article_6.title: Article 6 - Usage Fees and Payment Methods
article_6.content_1: The Service is free of charge (excluding communication fees required to use the Service), but the Company may introduce paid services or paid plans in the future. In such cases, the Company will notify Users in advance by announcing on the website or other methods deemed appropriate by the Company.

article_7.title: Article 7 - Warranties and Obligations Regarding Posted Information
article_7.content_1: ・Users who post information using the Service shall warrant to the Company that such posted information does not infringe the rights of third parties.
article_7.content_2: ・In the event that information posted by a User infringes the rights of a third party or causes any dispute with a third party, the User shall resolve the issue at their own expense and responsibility and shall not cause any damage to the Company.
article_7.content_3: ・Users shall manage and save all data such as images and text they create at their own responsibility. Users shall save data such as images or text being edited for uploading to the Service or uploaded images or text by methods such as taking backups as appropriate. While the Company will make reasonable efforts in service operation to save data such as images and text, it does not guarantee such preservation.

article_8.title: Article 8 - Posting
article_8.content_1: ・Creators may post arbitrary posted content on the Creator page after setting the publication range by the method specified by the Company.
article_8.content_2: ・When using the Service, Creators shall not post data or posted content that falls under any of the following, or engage in actions that lead to external online storage services or other external web services for the purpose of publication. If the Company determines that content falls under these categories, it may request corrections from the Creator, delete all or part of the posted content, change the publication range, or take other measures. Depending on the circumstances, the Company may cancel the Creator's registration. However, the Company is not obligated to take these measures and is not obligated to disclose the reasons for taking these measures.
article_8.content_2_1: 1. Obscene expressions or excessively distorted sexual expressions
article_8.content_2_2: 2. Violent or cruel expressions that are highly stimulating and cause disgust or discomfort
article_8.content_2_3: 3. Expressions that glorify or encourage extreme ideologies or antisocial behavior
article_8.content_2_4: 4. Expressions that glorify or encourage discrimination based on race, creed, occupation, gender, religion, etc.
article_8.content_2_5: 5. Expressions that glorify or encourage cult-like religious activities or excessive political activities
article_8.content_2_6: 6. Content that, when a third party makes claims of rights infringement or other matters, the Company examines and determines that it cannot be said that the third party's claims are without reason
article_8.content_2_7: 7. Content that has been pointed out or commented on by public institutions or experts (national or local governments, reliability verification organizations specified in the guidelines for the Act on the Limitation of Liability for Damages of Specified Telecommunications Service Providers and the Right to Demand Disclosure of Identification Information of the Sender, Internet Hotline, lawyers, etc.) as illegal, contrary to public order and morals, or infringing the rights of others
article_8.content_2_8: 8. Expressions that infringe the rights of third parties and are deemed inappropriate as expressions provided on this individual service even considering freedom of expression
article_8.content_2_9: 9. Information products related to finance such as FX, stocks, cryptocurrencies, associated tools and related content
article_8.content_2_10: 10. Content designated by the Company as "AI-generated content" (defined in the next article) in the Service

article_9.title: Article 9 - AI-generated Content
article_9.content_intro: In the Service, content that meets the following requirements is defined as "AI-generated content":
article_9.content_1: ・Content generated using AI (including similar technologies) in all or a major part of the production process, or content with minor modifications to such content

article_10.title: Article 10 - Prohibited Acts
article_10.content_intro: Users shall not engage in the following acts when using the Service. If prohibited acts are committed, measures such as deletion of all or part of posted content, forced withdrawal, or suspension of use may be taken.
article_10.content_1: ・Acts that violate laws or public order and morals
article_10.content_3: ・Acts that infringe or may infringe the Company's or third parties' copyrights, design rights, or other intellectual property rights, or other rights
article_10.content_4: ・Acts of reproducing posted information on the Service without the consent of the author (creator)
article_10.content_5: ・Acts that destroy or interfere with the functions of the Company's, other Users', or other third parties' servers or networks
article_10.content_6: ・Acts of commercially using information obtained through the Service
article_10.content_7: ・Acts that may interfere with the Company's service operations
article_10.content_8: ・Acts of unauthorized access or attempts thereof
article_10.content_9: ・Acts of collecting or accumulating personal information about other Users
article_10.content_10: ・Acts of using the Service for fraudulent purposes
article_10.content_11: ・Acts that cause disadvantage, damage, or discomfort to other Users of the Service or other third parties
article_10.content_13: ・Advertising, solicitation, or business activities on the Service not authorized by the Company
article_10.content_14: ・Acts aimed at meeting strangers of the opposite sex
article_10.content_15: ・Acts of directly or indirectly providing benefits to antisocial forces in connection with the Company's services
article_10.content_16: ・Other acts deemed inappropriate by the Company

article_11.title: Article 11 - Disclaimer of Warranties and Exemption from Liability
article_11.content_1: ・The Company does not explicitly or implicitly guarantee that the Service is free from defects (including defects related to safety, reliability, accuracy, completeness, effectiveness, fitness for a particular purpose, security, errors or bugs, infringement of rights, etc.) in fact or in law.
article_11.content_2: ・The Company shall not be liable for any damages caused to Users arising from the Service, except in cases of intentional or gross negligence by the Company. However, this disclaimer does not apply if the contract between the Company and Users regarding the Service (including these Terms) constitutes a consumer contract as defined in the Consumer Contract Act.
article_11.content_3: ・Even in cases stipulated in the proviso of the preceding paragraph, the Company shall not be liable for any damages arising from special circumstances (including cases where the Company or Users foresaw or could have foreseen the occurrence of damages) caused to Users by breach of contract or tort due to negligence (excluding gross negligence) by the Company. Furthermore, compensation for damages caused to Users by breach of contract or tort due to negligence (excluding gross negligence) by the Company shall be limited to the amount of usage fees received from Users in the month in which the damage occurred.
article_11.content_4: ・In the event of any dispute between Users or between Users and third parties, it shall be resolved between the Users or between the Users and the third parties, and the Company shall not be liable.
article_11.content_5: ・The Company shall not be liable for damages suffered by Users or others arising from delays or interruptions in the provision of the Service due to any of the following or other reasons, unless otherwise specified in these Terms:
article_11.content_5_1: 1. When regularly or urgently performing maintenance on equipment for the Service
article_11.content_5_2: 2. When the Service cannot be provided due to fire, power outage, etc.
article_11.content_5_3: 3. When the Service cannot be provided due to natural disasters such as earthquakes, volcanic eruptions, floods, tsunamis, etc.
article_11.content_5_4: 4. When the Service cannot be provided due to war, upheaval, riot, disturbance, labor disputes, etc.
article_11.content_5_5: 5. Due to failures in equipment or systems used by the Company, maintenance, etc.
article_11.content_5_6: 6. When display speed decreases or failures occur due to excessive access or other unforeseen factors
article_11.content_5_7: 7. When security problems occur that cannot be prevented by normally implemented anti-spying measures, use of software without known defects, antivirus measures, etc.
article_11.content_5_8: 8. When the Company determines that temporary suspension of the Service is necessary operationally or technically
article_11.content_6: ・The Company is not obligated to manage or save posted information posted by Users

article_12.title: Article 12 - Prohibition of Transfer of Rights and Obligations
article_12.content_1: Users may not transfer their contractual status or rights or obligations under these Terms to third parties, or pledge them as collateral, without the prior written consent of the Company.

article_13.title: Article 13 - Changes to Service Content
article_13.content_1: The Company may change, add, or discontinue the content of the Service without prior notice to Users, and Users agree to this. These responses shall be made with consideration for Users' convenience.

article_14.title: Article 14 - Notices and Communications
article_14.content_1: Notices and communications between Users and the Company shall be made by the method specified by the Company. Unless the Company receives a change notification from Users in accordance with the format separately specified by the Company, the Company shall deem the currently registered contact information as valid and send notices or communications to that contact information, which shall be deemed to have reached Users at the time of transmission.

article_15.title: Article 15 - Governing Law and Jurisdiction
article_15.content_1: ・Japanese law shall be the governing law for the interpretation of these Terms.
article_15.content_2: ・In the event of any dispute regarding the Service, the court having jurisdiction over the Company's location shall have exclusive agreed jurisdiction.

article_16.title: Article 16 - Company Information
article_16.content_1: Location and personal information shall be disclosed only when there are legitimate reasons.

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.intro: {serviceName} (hereinafter referred to as "the Company") establishes the following Privacy Policy (hereinafter referred to as "this Policy") regarding the handling of users' personal information in the service (hereinafter referred to as "the Service") provided on this website.

article_1.title: Article 1 - Information Obtained from Customers
article_1.content_intro: The Company obtains the following information from customers:
article_1.content_3: ・IDs used by customers on external services, and other information that customers have authorized to be disclosed to linked services according to the privacy settings of external services
article_1.content_4: ・Identification information generated using cookies and local storage
article_1.content_5: ・Information about the OS and devices used by customers, such as IDs generated by the OS, device type, and device identifiers

article_2.title: Article 2 - Purposes of Using Customer Information
article_2.content_intro: The Company will not use information obtained from customers for purposes other than the following:
article_2.content_1: ・To accept registration for the Company's services, verify customers' identity, and authenticate them
article_2.content_2: ・To manage customers' usage history of the Company's services
article_2.content_3: ・To analyze customers' behavior history in the Company's services and use it for maintaining and improving the Company's services
article_2.content_4: ・To provide information about the Company's services
article_2.content_6: ・To respond to acts that violate the Company's terms or laws
article_2.content_7: ・To notify customers of changes, suspension, termination, or contract cancellation of the Company's services
article_2.content_8: ・In addition to the above, to provide, maintain, protect, and improve the Company's services

article_3.title: Article 3 - Provision of Personal Information to Third Parties
article_3.content_intro: The Company will not provide personal data (Article 16, Paragraph 3 of the Personal Information Protection Act) obtained from customers to third parties (including those outside Japan) without obtaining customers' prior consent. However, the following cases are excluded:
article_3.content_1: ・When the Company entrusts all or part of the handling of personal information within the scope necessary to achieve the purpose of use
article_3.content_2: ・When the Company or the Company's services are acquired
article_3.content_3: ・When jointly used with business partners (if there is specific joint use, its content will be separately announced)
article_3.content_4: ・When provision to third parties is legally permitted

article_4.title: Article 4 - Access Analysis Tools
article_4.content_intro: The Company uses "Google Analytics" for access analysis of customers. Google Analytics uses cookies to collect traffic data. Traffic data is collected anonymously and does not identify individuals. You can refuse collection of this information by disabling cookies. Please check your browser settings for details. For more information about Google Analytics, please visit

article_5.title: Article 5 - Changes to Privacy Policy
article_5.content_1: ・The content of this Policy may be changed without notifying users, except for matters separately provided in laws and regulations or this Policy.
article_5.content_2: ・The revised Policy shall become effective when posted in the Service.

article_6.title: Article 6 - Changes to Purposes of Use
article_6.content_1: ・The Company may change the purpose of use of personal information only when it is reasonably recognized that the purpose of use is related to the previous purpose.
article_6.content_2: ・When the purpose of use is changed, the Company shall announce the changed purpose on this website by the method specified by the Company.

article_7.title: Article 7 - Correction and Deletion of Personal Information
article_7.content_1: ・If users find that their personal information held by the Company is incorrect, they may request the Company to correct, add, or delete (hereinafter referred to as "correction, etc.") their personal information by following the procedures established by the Company.
article_7.content_2: ・When the Company receives a request from a user under the preceding paragraph and determines that it is necessary to respond to the request, the Company shall promptly correct the personal information.

article_8.title: Article 8 - Inquiry Contact
article_8.content_1: Inquiries regarding this Policy will be accepted through the inquiry form on the website.
